data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Joachim (2015): On the Eocene age of Limodromus Motschulsky, 1850, with description of L. hoffeinsorum sp. n. from Baltic Amber (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Platynini). Zootaxa 3974 (4): 573-581, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.4.8
